metadata.title: Uzviyo Compatible with Fitbit Charge 5 Watch Band, Adjustable Bling Jewelry Metal Stainless Steel Strap Wristband Replacement for Fitbit Charge 5 with Removal Tool Women Men
features: 【Unique Design】 This Uzviyo stainless steel watch band embellished with bling diamonds is elegant and unique personality. It makes your watch more fashionable and upscale, and it brings you good luck every day. Your elegance will be added for occasions like business, outdoor sports, etc. Also, it is a good gift for birthday, Christmas, etc.
【Compatible】 Uzviyo metal bands compatible for Fitbit Charge 5 watch. Band size for 5.0" - 8.6" (127mm-218mm) wrist, please measure your wrist size accurately before purchasing.

【Adjustable】 The length of the strap can be easily adjusted. A links removal tool for disassembly is included in the package. Aim the pin of the removal tool at the hole of the wrist band, and push the pin to remove the excessive metal parts. Then connect the ends of the wrist band together. You can use the tool follow our instruction picture.

【Quality Materials】 The Uzviyo stainless steel watch wristband replacement is smooth and well polished. The color is shiny and will not fade. It will make you wear more comfortable on your wrist. Also, it is easy to clean.

【Easy Installation & Stable connection】 Easy to install and remove from the watch. The connection between the band and watch is very stable. We did a lot of tests with the connector to ensure that the connection is stable, so no need to worry about the watch accidentally falling off.
description: Uzviyo Latest Style Metal Bling Band Compatible for Fitbit Charge 5 Watch

- This Uzviyo stainless steel watch band embellished with bling diamonds is elegant and unique personality. It makes your watch more fashionable and upscale, and it brings you good luck every day. Your elegance will be added for occasions like business, outdoor sports, etc. Also, it is a good gift for birthday, Christmas, etc. - The Uzviyo stainless steel watch watch wristband is smooth and well polished. The color is shiny and will not fade. It will make you wear more comfortable on your wrist. Also, it is easy to clean.

1. Before disassembly, please distinguish the arrow icon on the watch band. You need to put the needle of the tool according to the indication of the arrow. That is to say, do not choose the hole with an "I" image, and the other hole is right. 2. Put the watch band in the slot of the tool. Arrange the watch band and make sure it is perfectly put in the slot.  3. Insert the needle of the tool into the right hole of the watch band. Rotate the needle to take the link out.  You can use the tool follow our instruction picture.
There are four colors for your choice: Black, Silver Black, Silver Pink, Pink Gold!
We use the stable connector between the band and watch, please wait a few seconds after you slip it into your watch, make sure the band won't up and down when it sits in a place completely.
1 x metal band for Fitbit Charge 5 watch + 1 x removal tool, NOTE: Just a replacement band, no watch included.
If there are any quality issues within 12 months, please be free to contact us, and we’ll give you a satisfactory solution as soon as possible. Thank you.

title: Uzviyo Bling Jewelry Metal Band for Fitbit Charge 5 -3
